import React, {useState} from 'react' import Sidebar from '../../components/Sidebar' import Header from '../../components/Header' import Pagination from '../../components/Pagination' export default function MoviesPage() { const movies = [ { id: 1, name: "Inception", imageUrl: "/inception.jpg" }, { id: 2, name: "Interstellar", imageUrl: "/interstellar.jpg" }, { id: 3, name: "Memento", imageUrl: "/memento.jpg" }, ]; const itemsPerPage = 6 const pageCount = Math.ceil(movies.length / itemsPerPage) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) // 3) O sayfanın öğeleri const startIdx = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage const currentItems = movies.slice(startIdx, startIdx + itemsPerPage) return (
Movie ID
Movie Name
Movie Image
{movies.map((m) => (
{m.id}
{m.name}
{m.imageUrl}
 ))}
); }
